column4: something is total fubar with this ubuntu, for whatever reason 'sudo' was causing the 'timestamp' problem.  Literely repeating the command about 10 times got it set.  This is very screwed up.  I'd like to reinstall these packages if anyone can suggest what packages I need to reinstall?
reinstalling packages doesn't change the settings, and seldom solves any problems.
did you enable to see hidden files?
